Protocols/RVS_IPAddress.html.name: RVS_IPAddress
Protocols/RVS_IPAddress.html.abstract: This protocol is an abstract base for IP addresses. When we parse a String as an IP address, it will return a specific implementation of this.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.name: firstUppercased
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.abstract: This extension lets us uppercase only the first letter of the string (used for weekdays).

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.abstract: The following calculated property comes from this: http://stackoverflow.com/a/27736118/879365

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.abstract: This allows us to find the last index of a substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.name: indexes(of:options:)

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy15RV.name: ranges(of:options:)

Classes/RVS_MediaServer_SettingsViewCont.abstract: This contains the mini webserver that we use to serve the converted HSL stream.

Classes/RVS_MediaServer_AppDelegate.html.abstract: This displays a simple alert, with an OK button.

Classes/RVS_MediaServer_PersistentPrefs/.name: password

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This is a persistent defaults class (not a struct -we want this to be by reference). It uses the app standard userDefaults mechanism
